channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Checkmarx Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Checkmarx Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-25201|2024-08-03T04:36:06.623Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20checkmarx%20plugin
item.description: Missing permission checks in Jenkins Checkmarx Plugin 2022.1.2 and earlier allow attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified webserver using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-25200|2024-08-03T04:36:06.496Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20checkmarx%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Checkmarx Plugin 2022.1.2 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified webserver using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.
